name: TheVelvetTouch
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the velvet touch
des: The Velvet Touch, your haven for smooth contemporary jazz, now available on the Alexa app! Immerse yourself in the sophisticated and soulful sounds curated by our expert DJs. From mellow melodies to rhythmic grooves, The Velvet Touch is your gateway to a world of refined musical bliss. What sets us apart? Our live DJs, connoisseurs of the jazz realm, who bring their knowledge and passion to every note. Let their expertise guide you through a seamless blend of contemporary jazz, creating an ambiance of pure relaxation. Elevate your listening experience with The Velvet Touch, where live DJs make every moment a masterpiece. Tune in and let the smooth jazz embrace you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
